alert.note: Alert for Merced (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued August 21 at 1:12PM PDT until August 21 at 1:45PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hanford CA has issued a * Tornado Warning for... South central Merced County in central California... * Until 145 PM PDT. * At 111 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 7 miles south of Los Banos, or 30 miles east of Hollister, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Los Banos around 125 PM PDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Dos Palos. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. This storm may be producing accumulating hail also.
